name: perseverant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the quality of continuing to make an effort to do or achieve something, even when this is difficult or takes a long time: Farming is for people who are ambitious and perseverant. There was a perseverant knocking at the door. This breed of dog is inquisitive and perseverant in investigating scents.
